title: Putin Is Accidentally Helping Unite Eastern and Western Ukraine - The New Republic
author: Leonid Ragozin

title: TASS: World - Donbass defenders put WWII tank back into service
Children run for their lives at beach near Donetsk during mortar fire
TASS: World - Ukraine's army launches massive offensive operation on Donetsk
BBC: Ukrainian military 'seizes Avdiivka' in rebel Donetsk stronghold
Ukraine clashes rage for third day, sparking EU concern
quote: An AFP reporter saw the separatists shell the town of about 20,000 people with repeated rounds of Grad multiple rocket systems and artillery fire from the early morning. "Right now, there is no power. We have not resolved problems with heating homes, and the gas pipe has been shattered," local Ukrainian army unit spokeswoman Olena Mokrynchuk told AFP [...] The town's heating is provided by a coke plant that has been heavily damaged by the falling shells. Plant director Musa Magomedov said it would be incredibly difficult to resume gas production were the factory's generators shut down. That would leave Avdiivka without a source of local power and uncertainty about its future.
